text:
There is no way for you to cross the chasm. Though the Emblem of Vicory stands in sight, it is unattainable. You espy a black-cloaked figure with a golden sword in hand climbing the atoll towards it, Icon the Ungodly. He will win the contest on behalf of Magus Uru, and reap the rewards of wealth and fame, while you languish here forever in the stifling mists that fill the Battlepits of Krarth.

Your quest ends in failure.
